inclusion.criterion: presentation to the Emergency Department and/or admission to the hospital
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: admitted to the hospital after 10 days of cough, profuse nocturnal sweating and loss of appetite.

inclusion.criterion: diagnosis of acute decompensated heart failure
inclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a positive sputum culture for Mycobacterium tuberculosis, which are sensitive to first-line TB drugs.
